mapper.select: /* /test/testMapper.xml - testList ( 테스트 조회 ) */ SELECT PROFILE_ID AS profileId /* PROFILE_ID */ ,FRIEND_ID AS friendId /* FRIEND_ID */ ,X_ID AS xId /* X_ID */ FROM FRIEND /* FRIEND Table */ WHERE PROFILE_ID = #{profileId}

/* /department/departmentMapper.xml - departmentList (학과조회) */ SELECT DEPT_CODE as deptCode /*학과코드*/ ,DEPT_NAME as deptName /*학과명*/ FROM DEPARTMENT /*학과테이블*/
WHERE 1=1
and dept_code = #{deptCode} /*학과코드*/
and dept_name = #{deptName} /*학과명*/
mapper.insert: /* /department/departmetnMapper.xml - departmentInsert (확과등록) */ INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT (DEPT_CODE /*학과코드*/ , DEPT_NAME /*학과명*/ , DEPT_ENAME /*학과영문명*/ , CREATE_DATE) /*학과생성일자*/ VALUES(#{deptCode} /*학과코드*/ ,#{deptName} /*학과명*/ ,#{deptEname} /*학과영문명*/ ,now() )/*학과생성일자*/
mapper.update: /* /department/departmetnMapper.xml - departmentUpdate (확과등록) */ UPDATE DEPARTMENT SET DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} /*학과코드*/ , DEPT_NAME = #{deptName} /*학과명*/ , DEPT_ENAME = #{deptEname} /*학과영문명*/ , CREATE_DATE = now() /*학과생성일자*/ where DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
